attachmentPolicyRuleNumber.description: The policy rule number associated with the attachment.

coreNetworkArn.description: The ARN of a core network.

coreNetworkId.description: The ID of a core network where you want to create the attachment.

edgeLocation.description: The Region where the edge is located.

options.description:
Options block. See options for more information.

The following arguments are optional:

ownerAccountId.description: The ID of the attachment account owner.

segmentName.description: The name of the segment attachment.

tags.description: Key-value tags for the attachment. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

transportAttachmentId.description: The ID of the attachment between the two connections.
